entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 7:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -21.3°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
